an4.104:1.8: Evamevam kho, bhikkhave, cattaro udakarahadupama puggala santo samvijjamana lokasmim.
an4.104:2.1: Kathanca, bhikkhave, puggalo uttano hoti gambhirobhaso?
an4.104:2.2: Idha, bhikkhave, ekaccassa puggalassa pasadikam hoti abhikkantam patikkantam alokitam vilokitam saminjitam pasaritam sanghatipattacivaradharanam.
an4.104:2.3: So ‘idam dukkhan’ti yathabhutam nappajanati …pe… ‘ayam dukkhanirodhagamini patipada’ti yathabhutam nappajanati.
an4.104:2.4: Evam kho, bhikkhave, puggalo uttano hoti gambhirobhaso.
an4.104:2.5: Seyyathapi so, bhikkhave, udakarahado uttano gambhirobhaso;
an4.104:3.1: Kathanca, bhikkhave, puggalo gambhiro hoti uttanobhaso?
an4.104:3.2: Idha, bhikkhave, ekaccassa puggalassa na pasadikam hoti abhikkantam patikkantam alokitam vilokitam saminjitam pasaritam sanghatipattacivaradharanam.
an4.104:3.3: So ‘idam dukkhan’ti yathabhutam pajanati …pe… ‘ayam dukkhanirodhagamini patipada’ti yathabhutam pajanati.
an4.104:3.4: Evam kho, bhikkhave, puggalo gambhiro hoti uttanobhaso.
an4.104:3.5: Seyyathapi so, bhikkhave, udakarahado gambhiro uttanobhaso;
an4.104:4.1: Kathanca, bhikkhave, puggalo uttano hoti uttanobhaso?
an4.104:4.2: Idha, bhikkhave, ekaccassa puggalassa na pasadikam hoti abhikkantam patikkantam alokitam vilokitam saminjitam pasaritam sanghatipattacivaradharanam.
an4.104:4.3: So ‘idam dukkhan’ti yathabhutam nappajanati …pe… ‘ayam dukkhanirodhagamini patipada’ti yathabhutam nappajanati.
an4.104:4.4: Evam kho, bhikkhave, puggalo uttano hoti uttanobhaso.
an4.104:4.5: Seyyathapi so, bhikkhave, udakarahado uttano uttanobhaso;
an4.104:5.1: Kathanca, bhikkhave, puggalo gambhiro hoti gambhirobhaso?
an4.104:5.2: Idha, bhikkhave, ekaccassa puggalassa pasadikam hoti abhikkantam patikkantam alokitam vilokitam saminjitam pasaritam sanghatipattacivaradharanam.
an4.104:5.3: So ‘idam dukkhan’ti yathabhutam pajanati …pe… ‘ayam dukkhanirodhagamini patipada’ti yathabhutam pajanati.
an4.104:5.4: Evam kho, bhikkhave, puggalo gambhiro hoti gambhirobhaso.
an4.104:5.5: Seyyathapi so, bhikkhave, udakarahado gambhiro gambhirobhaso;
an4.104:5.7: Ime kho, bhikkhave, cattaro udakarahadupama puggala santo samvijjamana lokasmin”ti.
